ABU SHAD KHAN  (Electrical Engineer)

Profile
2014 - 2016   Al-Rashid Trading & Contracting Company Ltd (Saudi Arabia),Site Electrical Eng
2012 - 2014   Kevin Power Solution Ltd (Noida, Delhi), Assistant Engineer 
2008 - 2012   Bachelor of Technology in Electrical & Electronics, Al-Falah School of 
                      Engineering & Technology, MDU University, Faridabad, Haryana   
 
Professional Experience
( 4+ Years of Experience in Electrical works in Building Constructions )
Successfully completed the Dormitories Project {including 10 building, one mosque
&  four  electrical  room},  MOI,  Riyadh,  Saudi  Arabia,  Al  –  Rashid  Trading  &
Contracting Company Ltd.
Work in Army Residential Project ,MOI, Jizan ,Saudi Arabia ,RTCCSuccessfully completed the Power backup , Panel installation & Maintenance Projects
in  Fortis  Hospital,  ICCI  Bank  ,Crown  Plaza,etc  (  Kevin  Power  Solutions
Ltd,Noida,India)
Key Responsibilities
Review and coordinate design drawings and specifications to ensure compliance with
project requirements.
Responsible of all activities pertaining to the electrical services, low current & control
systems in the projects .
Participate in all the site electrical works for medium voltage and low voltage networks &
low  current  systems  including  substation,  electrical  panel  boards,  indoor  electrical
distribution, earthing protection, outdoor lighting, telephone, data & TV networks, fire
alarm & voice evacuation system, security & access control systems.
Perform and implement value-engineering proposals on the design.
Prepare site record drawings to reflect any changes carried out on site due to customers’
requirements.
Quantity surveying for all electrical services, instrumentation and low current systems
Assist in preparing the material acquisition plan and shop drawings plan.
Conduct technical meetings with the systems suppliers and prepare material  submittals
Assist in preparing the material acquisition plan and shop drawings plan.
Coordinate between electrical discipline and all other engineering disciplines.
Tackle all the engineering correspondences related to electrical woks .
Attend the testing and commissioning for the electrical systems.
Key Skill & Competencies
Ability to prepare Operation & Maintenance Manuals
Experience of working to British, European standards.  
Strong decision-making skills and the ability to prioritize and plan effectivelyMethodical approach to all tasks. Knowledge of Building Services. Ability and also
willingness  to  work  in  all  weather  conditions.  Excellent  customer  facing  and
communication skills.
Technical Skill
Operating System     :  Window & DOS
CADD                           :  AutoCAD
Office Management :  MS-Office
